answers.answer: Did you eat or drink anything before the test?

U already got ur results?? When did u do it I did mine yesterday. An had to have blood drawn 3 times along with 2hr appt. I felt so sick all day yesterday an could barely eat anything but today is a whole other story I feel like I can pig out lol.
Yea i ate a bowl of corn flakes without any sugar and it was super small and an hour before i drank the drink and lol i did mine monday and got my results back today

If you failed the one hour test then you will have to go back for a three hours one. And you will have to fast for it. No food or drink pass midnight before test. Bring a book to read and some snack for right after you're done.I failed my 1-hr but pass my 3-hr one so don't worry. Good luck.

With my last pregnancy I failed both test thank God I was able to control my sugar with a diet I am now 12 weeks 2 days preggo I am being tested early for the diabetes I go sept 25 for the test I am nervous I have it with this pregnancy .. good luck with your there hour test and if you happen to fail it just listen to your drs and follow the diet and u will be fine
Thanks everyone :) & i really don't want to do the 3 hour! Those drinks are nasty..but i have to and will be getting it dont on monday.

I haven't done mine yet but my dr said on my next visit, which is next week, that she would order the lab work for it. I'm dreading it. The nasty drink sounds awful and I don't want to have to sit I. The lab for several hours while I wait to have my blood drawn again. Yuck.

Well the first test is just you drink the drink and one hour later they draw your blood and the drink is just like really sugary flat orange soda & then if you fail that test you have to do a second one which is 3 hour.

I failed the first test with my son but passed the three hour one. :0) the 3 hour one is a lot more blood work and a lot longer but I hope you pass this second time. Just don't eat anything this next time you do it.

haha I had waffles for breakfast before my one hour test so I know I will be back for the three hour test..I have failed my first two one hour tests but passed the three hour ones...don't worry in sure you will be fine

I Have grstational diabetes... And honestly it *****, but if u think how ur helping ur baby by eating healthy and sticking to food guidelines and blood levels, then that helps a lot. And it will go away.I wasn't aloud to eat anything for before my test, only drink water.  I drank the drink, had bloods done 1hr later, then 2hrs later.CANT WAIT TO EAT A BIG SLICE OF MUD CAKE!!!!!!

You probably failed because of what you ate. You're only supposed to eat meat before the test, (bacon, eggs, sausage). Cereal and milk will turn into sugar. I had diabetes with my first son starting in my first trimester, and i somehow didnt get it with this pregnancy. If you do test positive for it, it isn't back. You have to watch what you eat.
